ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We thank María Eugenia de Porras for providing pollen concentration data and discussion regarding its interpretation, and Sarah Richardson for statistical advice. This research was funded by FONDECYT Postdoctorado # 3150616 to F.P.D, iBio Iniciativa Científica Milenio-MINECON and Fondo de Desarrollo de Areas Prioritarias (FONDAP) Center for Genome Regulation (15090007). C.L acknowledges Aporte de Financiamiento Basal (AFB-170008). J.R.W. and J.M.W. acknowledge Core funding for Crown Research Institutes from the New Zealand Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment’s Science and Innovation Group.
